lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I believe I have a responsibility to use what I have to help others around me who strive to become more than they are, to help them take their skills and talents and hard work and use those to provide a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities. lender.name: Lukasz
lender.loan_because: It is my duty and privilege to help the people, who just found in the worse economic & political situation. Everything what I have, I have from God - it is not my achievement that I'm well and not sick or abandoned.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in helping others and lending a hand to those in need.

lender.name: Makenzie & Katie Jo
lender.loan_because: My aunt gave me this for christmas and i finally got to do it when she came home for 4 days in the summer. When i did this i felt really good that i was helping someone that needed instead of me getting something that i really don't need.
lender.occupational_info: not in work still i school

lender.name: Moses
lender.loan_because:
My name is Arinaitwe Moses. I am male, Ugandan by nationality and 26 years of age. I am a born again Christian by faith and have recently graduated from Ggaba Bible Institute in Kampala, Uganda, with a degree in theology. As an answer to my pastoral call, I have decided to establish a church to extend and expand the kingdom of Jesus Christ the Lord to my remote home area of Hoima in the mid-western part of Uganda. I have a great desire to be a mouth piece and channel of Jesus Christ in reaching these people and areas of western Uganda with the good news of Jesus Christ the Lord as a laborer in His vineyard.
In order to sustain myself and my family, I desire to create a business where I would buy and sell maize and beans. I need $600 to establish and begin this business venture. My mission is to buy the products at a fair price so that my suppliers may also gain a decent profit. I hope to create a great future for my family and the community at large. With the profits from my business, I hope to start a program to help orphans and those in need. Eventually, Id like to have a big store where I can put these goods for resale.
I have a passion for Uganda (Africa) to be lifted out of its poverty because by way of experience, I know what it means to live without.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It is a hand-up, not a hand-out!
lender.occupational_info: I work with other devoted employees who believe their social mission is to help the members of our Credit Union attain better financial peace

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It's a way to think globally and act locally, even if the locality isn't here in Texas. Everyone needs a helping hand at some time in her life, and I am proud to be in a position to offer help to these hard-working women.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop medicine to treat people with cancer. I dothis through my writing. I help plan out the studies (tests) of the drug to make sure it is safe and works, then I help write up everything that happened in the test and send it to the government group that approves drugs for use in each country.

lender.occupational_info: I work at a hedge fund (a type of financial management & investment trading business) which is located in Greenwich, CT in the U.S. It employs 8 other gentleman who are the traders and research analysts. I provide all the organizational support so that the office runs smoothly. I do whatever is needed behind the scenes so that the guys can concentrate on the research and trading. This includes tasks such as accounting, payroll, insurance, equipment repairs, marketing, as well as the more mundane - filing, ordering lunch and supplies and running errands.

lender.loan_because: It's important to help others in this world...
lender.occupational_info: I run a web media company that markets products for a range of companies... I also invest in mini companies / start ups and do a bit of consulting on the side...

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about being involved in the Kiva process and helping others to create value and purpose in their life
lender.occupational_info: I help large groups of people who have many tasks to accomplish these tasks on time and together
